params._protocolFeeBps: Initial protocol fee in basis points

params.preferredRouter: Preferred DEX router (AUTO for automatic selection)

returns.maxNewTokenTradeSize: Maximum trade size for new tokens

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.forceUniswap: Whether to force Uniswap routing for all trades
params.maxNewTokenTradeSize: Maximum trade size for new/unverified tokens
params.minLiquidityThreshold: Minimum liquidity threshold for using RobinPump

params.tokenAllowlist: List of allowed tokens (empty = all allowed)

params._protocolFeeBps: New protocol fee in basis points

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

depositToken(address,uint256).notice: Deposits ERC20 tokens into the vault

emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256,addres.notice: Emergency withdraw of tokens or ETH

executeTrade(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Executes a trade from the vault (original function, defaults to AUTO routing)

executeTradeWithRouter(address,address,u.notice: Executes a trade from the vault with DEX routing

extendedPolicies(address).notice: Extended trading policies for each user (DEX routing preferences)

getVaultBalance(address,address).notice: Gets the vault balance for a user and token

getVaultBalances(address,address[]).notice: Gets multiple vault balances for a user

initializeDefaultPolicy(address).notice: Initializes a default policy for a new user

setExtendedPolicy(address,uint256,bool,b.notice: Sets or updates a user's extended trading policy (DEX routing)

setPolicy(address,uint16,uint256,uint32,.notice: Sets or updates a user's trading policy

setSimplePolicy(address,uint16,uint256).notice: Sets a simplified policy for a user

simulateTrade(address,address,uint256).notice: Simulates a trade to get expected output

totalDeposits(address).notice: Total deposited amounts across all users

vaultBalances(address,address).notice: Vault balances for each user and token

withdrawAllETH().notice: Withdraws all ETH from the vault

withdrawAllToken(address).notice: Withdraws all tokens from the vault

withdrawToken(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws ERC20 tokens from the vault
